202 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
    to include English Language, History, 
Government, and any other subject from Arts and 
Social Sciences.  The sixth (6 th) could be from 
Science.  
(viii) KASU accepts Government in lieu of History.  
(ix) LAGOS requires five (5) ‘O’ levelcredit passes in  
 English  Language,  Mathematics,  
History/Government and any other two (2)Arts 
subject from Literature in English, CRS/ IS, Hausa, 
Yoruba, and Igbo, Civic Education.  
(x) NDA requires five (5)‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, History and two 
(2) other subjects from Commerce, Geography, 
Economics, French, Arabic, Account and 
Government.  
(xi) OAU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include History and English Language plus one 
(1)Arts subject and any other two (2) subjects 
from Arts or Social Sciences. Accepts 
Government in lieu of History.  
(xii) REDEEMER'S  accepts  ‘O’  level 
 pass  in Mathematics.  
(xiii) SAU and BENIN require ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English, History/Government and one (1) other 
Arts subject.  
(xiv) UMYUK requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at 
or its equivalent in English Language, one (1) of 
History or Government, any three (3) subjects 
from Arts or Social Sciences and ‘O’ level credit 
pass in Mathematics at not more than two (2) 
sittings.  
(xv) UNIKINGS requires ‘O’ level credit pass in 
Mathematics.  
 
REQUIREMENTS
